name: fuckyoufriday
text: Ray's dedication to the mile-high club knows no bounds.

name: pogo
text: A comment left by pogo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mr_lostman28, KaMeT, Plurabelle, GMM)

name: mbain3001
text: Well, it's a hobby.

name: greyfield
text: I don't want Larry King telling me that.

name: deimosrising
text: Another thing Ray and I have in common: We have allowed people to masturbate in our planes.

name: professoryes
text: My investors are interested in this.

name: redjoker
text: chubby for PA reference

name: ghostd
text: Mile High Club: Solo Aviators Division

name: ghostd
text:
I just noticed the acronym to that is SAD.

Hilarious.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
Go the Solo Aviators Division!
hello fellow member (tee hee member!)
last flight i was on i joined just for bragging rights
now i just need some people who would be impressed by that

name: farqussus
text: by 'some people' i assume you are excluding women.

name: heccibiggs
text: Yes, he is.

name: saint
text: interesting condition to put on the mile high club

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: Now here is a classy place to take a lady.

name: epicurus
text: This one just sums up perfectly why we never again Ray's Mile High venture.

name: rhymesforkids
text: yeah except for the next strip

name: epicurus
text: FUCK

name: zefiel
text: The Experience Affected Todd So Much, He Went On To Have His Own Airline.

name: deusoma
text: I give this one a 5 for the alt text alone, much less how funny the rest of it is.

name: deancain29
text: I love Ray's resignment when he's putting on his cap.

name: ortsac
text: It's so great that in a later strip the sign has a "Couples only" poster pasted on.

name: ortsac
text: And by "later strip" I of course mean the very next strip.

name: latterman
text:
Business is so slow.

"HOW SLOW IS IT?"

name: tekende
text: It was SO slow I let a squirrel masturbate in my plane! Hey-o!

name: radchillies
text:
son of a bitch. I thought a fly landed on my screen, and started blowing really hard to get it to go away before realizing it was your avatar.

I think this meets the criteria for becoming an hero

name: coco
text: Ray really reminds me of Royal Tenenbaum in this strip, except he's a Mile High club pilot, not an elevator operator . . . It's the glasses and the hat.

name: tekende
text: This actually makes me wonder something: How many people do you suppose masturbate on plane flights? Especially long ones, like trans-Atlantic flights? Probably a lot.

name: doctorbeene
text: happy belated birthday, Beef.
